DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD CUP USA ' 94 / THE FIRST ROUND ; WORLD CUP ' 94 / DAILY REPORT
DOC.TEXT: A survey of coaches of 24 World Cup teams and about 50 players by Italy ' s largest sports daily , Gazzetta dello Sport , predicted Brazil as the winner of the 1994 event , following a possible final with defending champion Germany . Italy would finish in the top four , along with Colombia . Brazilian forward Romario and Italy ' s Roberto Baggio would be the outstanding players , the survey showed .
